sqlMap.insert: insert into Tbl_Tx_Transfer_Response (id, version, responseId, versionNo, signMsg, transferResult, plTxTraceNo, merchantOrderNo, transferAmount, txTypeId, payDatetime, ext1, ext2, createdDatetime, lastUpdatedDatetime, lastUpdatedBy, errorCode, context, responseContent, creator, deleted) values (#id#, 1, #responseId#, #versionNo#, #signMsg#, #transferResult#, #plTxTraceNo#, #merchantOrderNo#, #transferAmount#, #txTypeId#, #payDatetime#, #ext1#, #ext2#, #createdDatetime#, #lastUpdatedDatetime#, #lastUpdatedBy#, #errorCode#, #context#, #responseContent#, #creator#, #deleted#)
sqlMap.update: update Tbl_Tx_Transfer_Response set version = #version# +1, responseId = #responseId#, versionNo = #versionNo#, signMsg = #signMsg#, transferResult = #transferResult#, plTxTraceNo = #plTxTraceNo#, merchantOrderNo = #merchantOrderNo#, transferAmount = #transferAmount#, txTypeId = #txTypeId#, payDatetime = #payDatetime#, ext1 = #ext1#, ext2 = #ext2#, createdDatetime = #createdDatetime#, lastUpdatedDatetime = #lastUpdatedDatetime#, lastUpdatedBy = #lastUpdatedBy#, errorCode = #errorCode#, context = #context#, responseContent = #responseContent#, creator = #creator#, deleted = #deleted# where id = #id#
